item.description:
The Silk Road Fine Fabrics & The Boston Fashion Meetup Group are thrilled to announce an Industry Experts Workshop Series with Patricia Keay.

Relax during the hectic holiday season to learn from a master teacher. Make a unique and beautiful gift or treat yourself to a fashionable embellishment you can wear on your clothing or handbag. Students will learn how to use bias tubing and fabric to create tendrils and leaves to make a beautiful movable corsage in 100% silk duoppioni in an array of rich and beautiful colours.

* Learn new sewing skills and techniques needed to design and make other lovely pieces
* Relax and get inspired in the company of other sewers and designers
* Enjoy the setting of beautiful fabrics, ribbons and trims at The Silk Road

Patricia Keay is an accomplished couturier and artist (an fellow meetup member), who contributes regularly to Threads Magazine.

The cost of the workshop for meetup members is $50 (includes a materials kit for $10)

You must pay in advance to RSVP through meetup. Or you can call Gay Appleby Rogers at 617.244.SILK (7455) to work out other payment arrangements. Just notify her that you are member of the meetup.

Space will be limited!
item.name: Exquisite Embellishments: Fabric Corsage Worshop
